idea:
The Vaari Solutions Foundation is underpinned by socio-economic challenges confronting developing countries across Globe and has carved a niche in building relevant solutions for the developing market. Vaari Solutions was established in 2019 as an entity and Special Purpose Vehicle to contribute to the attainment of socio-economic development.

 We notice with concern, the increasing technology innovation gap between India and the rest of the world. Our company focuses on distinct solutions and services which are identified as key critical enablers for any developing country to quantum leap into the industrial revolution. We seek to deliver solutions that will create an opportunity for developing countries to participate in the Global economy by leveraging on information technology.

The crux of why we exist is to develop innovative solutions that are relevant, easy to use, convenient and affordable. We seek to eliminate complexity and introduce flexibility Unlike your conventional IT Company, Vaari focuses on specific niche based, turn-key solutions instead of products. Our design thinking approach helps to develop Vaari solution that are flexible in a simple fashion.

What drives us is the aspiration to bridge the digital divide, Fastrack technology adoption and ensure pervasive penetration across all of world.

Unlike any conventional IT company, Vaari is a solution rather than a product-based company. Of necessity, Our solutions are relevant, localized, easy to deploy and use. Our solutions are based on open international standards and best practice, affordable, safe and secure.

Our economic model is based on affordability, pay for usage and avoids all sorts of huge initial capital outlay costs associated with IT acquisition. It is our conscious intention to keep operational costs of our solutions under affordable.
name: VAARI SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Quality focused , Systems driven , ethics based and customer centric Solar PV power plant EPC company .
name: VEMA SOLAR PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sanjeevani. co-founded its business operations with the concept of providing video diagnosis and medical consultations, while at the same time providing a holistic herbal formulation-based treatment for all chronic health diseases. Our scientific 4-point-healing process consisting of locally manufactured supplements, home remedies, diet, and lifestyle changes, all provided via video consultations, is devised to build trust and transparency in the adoption of natural healthcare amongst the millennial Indians. All are 100% natural supplements that can be directly purchased from our website (www.sanjeevanipharma.com), following which we set free consultations where health reports etc. are diagnosed by medical doctors over the phone or in-person.
Sanjeevani has massed ~10,000 customers so far in 2 years, with a 75% loyalty rate in customers m-o-m.
name: JEEVAN SANJEEVANI HERBS PRIVATE LIMITED
